moves.name: Crush Claw
moves.effect: Has a good chance of lowering the target’s Defense.

moves.name: Multi-Attack
moves.effect: This attack’s type is determined by the user’s type change.

moves.name: My Mind’s Made Up!
moves.effect: Changes the user’s type to that of the target’s weakness. This changes the user’s own weakness type and the type of the user’s Multi-Attack and Audacious Multi-Attack. Drastically raises the user’s Speed.

syncMove.name: Audacious Multi-Attack
syncMove.description: This attack’s type is determined by the user’s type change.

passives.name: Backfire 2
passives.description: Sharply lowers the Attack and Sp. Atk of all opposing sync pairs just before the user faints.
